name: Far Far Out
description:
Far Far Out is a space exploration game where you can win in three different ways.

You will discover planets, asteroids and star systems. Your spaceship and your crewmembers go on a Cosmic Odyssey where no one has ever gone before. Encounter strange lifeforms on planets, dig for items on asteroids or find quests that help you achieve your goal in this competitive galactic journey where you might help or frustrate other players in your hunt for Reputation, Wealth and Exploration.

The goal of the game is to have either 12 Victory Points on 1 track, or 6 Victory Points on each of the 3 tracks (total of 18).

description from the designer
